Vulnerability.Title: runc bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description: The runC tool is a lightweight, portable implementation of the Open Container Format (OCF) that provides container runtime. The runc package has been changed to build also for the 64-bit ARM architecture, the little-endian variant of IBM Power Systems, and for IBM z Systems. (BZ#1418899) Users of runc are advised to upgrade to this updated package, which fixes several bugs and adds this enhancement. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
